title: PODCAST: Preparing for a power outage
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, January 27, 2015
contentencoded: Warnings about company profits put a tremor into the stock market today. More on that. Plus, two big steel companies revealed their profits today. So, how is the industry looking? We'll also talk about how more and more Americans are making their own power, either by installing solar panels, or in areas with frequent storms, backup home generators.
